summary: Devon Energy Corporation is a company engaged in hydrocarbon exploration in the United States. It is organized in Delaware with operational headquarters in the 50-story Devon Energy Center in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. Its operations are in the Delaware Basin, Eagle Ford Group, and the Rocky Mountains (Williston Basin and Powder River Basin). The company is ranked 267th on the Fortune 500 and 607th on the Forbes Global 2000. As of December 31, 2024, the company had proved reserves of 2,155 million barrels of oil equivalent (1.318Ã—1010 GJ), of which 42% was petroleum, 29% was natural gas liquids, and 29% was natural gas.
